data.title: Douay Martyrs Catholic School
data.meta_description: The Douay Martyrs RC School is a Roman Catholic secondary school and sixth form with academy status, located in Ickenham within the London Borough of Hillingdon, England. It serves around 1,300 pupils..
data.text:
The Douay Martyrs Catholic Secondary School is part of the Diocese of Westminster Academy Trust.

The Local Governing Body are, as of September 2023:
